sentences.sContent: The company looks poised to make a significant breakthrough in China.
sentences.sCn: 该公司看上去稳将在中国实现一次重大突破。

sentences.sContent: ...including the research of new particles and the breakthrough of the H7N9 virus research...
...China will find a new breakthrough point to ensure the justice of education...

exam.question: While a full understanding of what causes the disease may be several years away, ______ leading to a successful treatment could come much sooner.

answer.explain: 句意： 尽管要完全理解这种疾病的病因、 病理还要花费好几年时间， 但不久就可以取得治疗方法的突破性进展了。distinction： 区别； identification： 辨认； interpretation： 解释。

trans.tranOther: an important new discovery in something you are studying, especially one made after trying for a long time
